title: Mutton Dhansak
procedure: Boil lentils till soft, then mash them.
Heat oil in a pan and saut√© onions till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and cook till the raw smell disappears.
Add lamb shanks and cook till brown.
Mix in turmeric, red chili powder, and coriander powder.
Add mashed lentils and tamarind paste.
Simmer for 30 minutes and garnish with coriander.
